challenges.title: Q1: ACID - A Stands For
challenges.description: In ACID properties of a transaction, A stands for:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Accuracy
b) Atomicity
c) Access
d) Association
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: Purpose of Index
challenges.description: The main purpose of an index in a database is to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Increase redundancy
b) Enforce referential integrity
c) Speed up data retrieval
d) Compress table data
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
